bs-bssmwconnector-nmmngr-label-smw: Label for column in grid of NamespaceManager extension
bs-dlg-choosesmwprop-label:
Label for combobox for choosing semantic properties
{{Identical|Property}}
bs-dlg-choosesmwprop-type-smwprop: Text for SemanticProperty type BookshelfUI extension
bs-extendedsearch-add-filter-group-smwpr: Label for the group holding semantic properties filters in the dialog for adding filters
bs-smwconnector-extendedsearch-smwproper: Helper message to show name and values of semantic property in search results. $1 - smw property name, $2 - smw property value
bs-extendedsearch-search-center-result-s: Label for the field in search results showing all semantic properties of a page
bs-smwconnector-extendedsearch-boolean-p:
Textual representation of boolean "true" value for semantic properties
{{Identical|Yes}}

Textual representation of boolean "false" value for semantic properties
{{Identical|No}}
bs-smwconnector-propertyvalueprovider-us: Description of _USERMENTIONS semantic special property, that stores all user pages of the users, that have been mentioned on this page
bs-swm-connector-ask-store-page-label: Default label for the main column in async-ask query
bs-smw-connector-async-ask-unknown-handl:
Error message when handler for given format in async ask query is not valid. 
$1 - format name
